Brief about Waikato University Scholarship

Online studies scholarship for international students at the University of Waikato is offered for Bachelors’s, Master’s Degree in the field of courses offered by the university.

The time limit for forwarding your application is time limit different. This

The scholarship is provided by the University of Waikato and the worth of this scholarship is limited

The bursary, 20% tuition fee. This scholarship is open for Open to worldwide students who are interested.

The University of Waikato is donating its most popular programs to begin online this July

2024 while we remain for the New Zealand border restrictions to ease. Students will transfer to

Face-to-face classes in New Zealand once they are able to go to the country. All Our online students will thrive in our virtual environment, with the support of our devoted staff.  Program has been created with online learners in mind.  Enjoy studying with students who are both online and on campus.

Eligibility criteria

 For Online Studies Scholarships for International Students at Waikato University:

Note that This Scholarship is planned to support endowed international students who are enrolling for the first time into undergraduate or postgraduate programmes at the University of Waikato. The Scholarships have a value of up to NZD$10,000, and will be awarded to thriving applicants who show excellent academic accomplishment.
